properties.address: The Mission Church, Street, Street BA16 0HZ
properties.description: Offering a warm welcome, coffee (or tea), snacks and the chance for a friendly chat, why not come along to the Mission Church, any Saturday, from 10.30 am - 12 noon? We can promise the building will be warm and comfortable; there is free wifi and parking, disabled access and easy pedestrian routes from the centre of Street, not to mention comfy chairs! Whoever you are, whatever your circumstances and whether or not you have ever stepped inside a church in your life before, you would be welcome.
properties.title: Coffee chat and snacks

properties.description: This space is open to all and is situated in the centre of Glastonbury. When you become a library member we offer free WIFI and public computers, a stand on health monitor which measures your weight height and blood pressure, alongside access to a variety of activities and groups. We have study areas, books, online council access help via video link and comfy chairs. Membership is free and items to borrow include books, eBooks, audio books, blood pressure monitors, iPads and smart watches. During the winter months we are a warm space for all and offer a warm winter coat exchange.
properties.title: Glastonbury Library

properties.description: Warm welcome space, open to all. We offer free WiFi, public computers, printing services, activities, groups and study areas. We also have scales to weigh your baby during opening hours (instructions available). Library membership is not required to use the space, but it is available, providing free access to books, eBooks, eMagazines and eNewspapers, health equipment, language learning , iPad loans and more... For more information on our services, please visit: https://www.somerset.gov.uk/libraries/
properties.title: Martock Library

properties.address: Street Mission Church, Street, Somerset BA16 0HZ
properties.description: We welcome all who are in need of a meal or some company on a Saturday morning 10:30-12. Our building is accessible to the disabled.
properties.title: Mission church street

properties.description: The Library is open to all during Library opening hours, details at https://somertonlibrary.com/
properties.title: Somerton Community Library

properties.description: This space is open to all and is situated in the centre of Street. When you become a library member we offer free WIFI and public computers, alongside access to a selection of activities and groups. We have a small study area, books, online council access help via video link and comfy chairs. Membership is free and items to borrow include books, eBooks, audio books, blood pressure monitors and iPads. We also have a digital den where a regular SWITCH club is run by volunteers. During the winter months we are a warm space for all and offer a warm winter coat exchange.
properties.title: Street Library

properties.address: The Crispin Community Centre, Leigh Road, Street, Somerset ba16 0ha
properties.description: Our coffee room has expanded its hours to become a warm space this Winter. We have hot drinks and snacks available and volunteers to chat with. All welcome
properties.title: The Crispin Community Centre

properties.address: The Red Brick Building Centre Ltd, Glastonbury, Somerset BA6 9FT
properties.description: The Snug and Snug lounge are on every Thursday at the Red Brick Building, Glastonbury 12pm - 5pm in collaboration with Glastonbury Mental Health Network A place to stay warm, enjoy some gentle company, create with self guided craft, mend & sew with guidance, read a book, try a puzzle, free wifi, receive support or signposting with trained listeners if you need it. FREE Entry, Free refreshments and hearty soup - All Welcome ðŸ’š
properties.title: The Snug Lounge
